entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Buffalo Narrows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:09 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -17.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Buffalo Narrows Airport 3:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -17.3°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -20.1°C
Wind: SE 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Snow at times heavy over southern sections late this evening and overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over southern sections. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
